name: GummyBearWizard
0:
”Alexa, ask Gummy bear wizard for a recommendation”
”Alexa, ask Gummy bear wizard for a drink”
”Alexa, ask Gummy bear wizard for a green pairing”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gummy bear wizard
des:
GUMMY BEAR WIZARD is your personal drink assistant for finding the right drink to pair with your favourite gummy bear flavour.
Ask Gummy bear wizard to help pair any gummy bear flavour: red, white, yellow, green, orange and get a drink pairing conjured up in seconds!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
